Thanks for an illustrative video.
I've found two links that describe a somewhat similar phenomena, but unfortunately none of them give a solution or root cause: http://support.mozilla.com/en-US/questions/800858 Bug 589466 - Firefox only executes when receiving mouse/keyboard input.sd
Do you have some kind of battery saving/hibernation/sleep mode etc enabled, and if so what happens if you turn it off?
Adding a link to a bug with some similarities: Bug 648831 - Pages stop loading unless there is mouse/keyboard input after downloading many files or uploading many files.
